articles.author: Asmita Pant
articles.title: IRFC Q2 Results: Profit slide year-on-year, revenue rises 16% - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Indian Railway Finance Corp Ltd (IRFC) reported its financial result for the quarter ended September 2023 on Thursday, November 2. The company reported a decline in net profit for the period under review.

articles.title: Tyre stock jumps up to 14% after company reports 406% increase in net profits; Announces expansion capacity - Trade Brains
articles.description: The shares of the leading tyre manufacturer soared 14 percent to Rs 351.25 a share after the company reported strong Q2 results and announced plans to expand tyre manufacturing capacity.
